description: The legend continues with the newest edition to the Lone Peak family. The Lone Peak 6 is ready to take on any terrain with trail features like our grippy MaxTrac™ outsole with TrailClaw™ canted lugs designed to keep you going. This evolution’s updated upper construction and customizable lacing system provides a more secure fit so you can take on the trails with confidence.
name: Altra Lone Peak 6 - Mens
